description: Dell AppSync, versions 4.4.0.0 to 4.6.0.0 including Service Pack releases, contains an improper access control vulnerability in Embedded Service Enabler component. A local malicious user could potentially exploit this vulnerability during installation leading to a privilege escalation.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: Versions 4.4.0.0, 4.5.0.0 and 4.6.0.0 including Service Pack releases
